name: Pumpkin Bridge
description:
Help our pumpkin find its way to Temoc!

Read Before Playing
  1. The pumpkin will ONLY travel on wood planks.
  2. Right click at any time to stop building from the current node.
How to Play Pumpkin Bridge

Start off by creating a path out of wood that connects the start and end points for the stage. Please note that the pumpkin will ONLY travel on wood planks. You can stop building out the current bar at any time by right clicking. 

Then, support this path using the existing anchor points and any material. Press the check button to begin the round!

Note that you only have $1000 to get through all the stages, so save wherever you can. Good luck!

Created for ACM Game Jam 2020. All assets created with Affinity Designer and Photoshop.
